Reach Out
Get in Touch with Dirty Oar Beer Company: The Ultimate Brewery Experience
What type of brews do you serve?
We offer a diverse selection for all tastes. Enjoy our unique craft beers, ales, and ciders brewed to perfection. Ideal for a night out or a casual hangout.
Do you offer any non-alcoholic options?
Our menu includes options for all, including non alcohol drinks.
What is the atmosphere like at Dirty Oar Beer Company?
Our brewery’s atmosphere is friendly and fun, reflecting our dedication to quality brews and great times. It’s a welcoming space where you’ll feel right at home.
Get in Touch with Dirty Oar Beer Company – Contact Us Today!

Brewed Fun: Where Craft Meets Community
Experience the Ultimate Fusion of High-Quality Brews and Barrel-Aged Perfection at Dirty Oar Beer Company
Raise a Glass to Fun at Dirty Oar Beer Company
Dirty Oar Beer Company in Cocoa Village, FL is a brewery, taproom and beer garden founded in 2017 offering 22 taps of our own brews accompanied by 2 taps of cider from around the US. We offer a wide variety of beer styles from mild to wild, kettle sours as well as Bourbon barrel aged selections. We invite you to join us at Cocoa’s first brewery in what is a relaxed atmosphere where “Nobody has more fun than us!”
Meet Our Dedicated Team
Discover the passionate team members who elevate our brews and service at Dirty Oar Beer Company. Each individual brings their unique talents to enrich our community ensuring a memorable experience and exceptional hospitality.
